text: On scoring repeated predictions on the same event, this is fine if you are using a scoring rule like Brier to compare different prediction methods at the same instants (i.e. with the same input values), and is quite different from trying to interpret repeated predictions of a single prediction method as the prediction accuracy will be dependent on the information quality in the market and the quality of the prediction method.
